name: You have not lived today until you have done something for someone who can never repay you.
description:
Everything earned will be donated to organisations helping families and civilians affected by the current situation/war in Europe. 1 XTZ can help a family in need. Offers above 1 Tezoz are also accepted.

The following video can be triggering and be disturbing to some, I only wish express my fears and process it through my art. Not meant to cause distress to others.

Original Kungen Artwork.

This artwork is a reflection of fear. We have entered a new era and the whole world is at a stand still. Overthinking, anxiety and doomsday thoughts burden a young mans thoughts. Are we bound for destruction or will we ever find peace between all men.

Donations will go to:
-Red Cross
-Save The Children 

If you want to donate on your own please check one of the following organisations named above.
